TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PnrpPeerResolverBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement

Docs.summary: Defines the binding element used to create a Peer Name Resolution Protocol (PNRP) peer resolver.

remarks.format: ## Remarks To create a peer resolver from an instance of this class, call <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PnrpPeerResolverBindingElement.CreatePeerResolver%2A> after the instance has been constructed.
